mapper.select: select t1.id as MAP_ID, t1.rule_id, t1.map_type, o1.org_code storeCode, o1.org_name storeName, o2.org_code subsectionCode, o2.org_name subsectionName, o3.org_code branchCode, o3.org_name branchName from ext_invoke_filter_rule_map t1 left join sys_org o1 on t1.map_code = o1.org_code left join sys_org o2 on o2.id = o1.parent_id left join sys_org o3 on o3.id = o2.parent_id where t1.rule_id = #{ruleId} and t1.map_type = #{mapType}

select t1.id as MAP_ID, t1.rule_id, t1.map_type, f1.func_type_code FUNC_CODE, f1.func_type_name FUNC_NAME, f2.func_type_code FUNC_TYPE_CODE, f2.func_type_name FUNC_TYPE_NAME, CASE WHEN f3.func_type_CODE='ROOT' THEN '' ELSE f3.func_type_code END AS FUNC_MODULE_CODE, CASE WHEN f3.func_type_name='功能类型' THEN '' ELSE f3.func_type_name END AS FUNC_MODULE_NAME from ext_invoke_filter_rule_map t1 left join ext_function_type f1 on t1.map_code = f1.func_type_code left join ext_function_type f2 on f2.id = f1.parent_id left join ext_function_type f3 on f3.id = f2.parent_id where t1.rule_id = #{ruleId} and t1.map_type = #{mapType}
mapper.delete: delete from ext_invoke_filter_rule_map t1 where t1.ID in (${ids} )
